verification.context: G17 resolved. checksum-elixir_mlx.exs created, mix hex.build succeeds, package files trimmed to exclude mlx-c build artifacts. 438 tests, 0 failures. All 18 constraints SATISFIED.

matrix.gap: 72 Nx.Backend callbacks + Mlx.Transforms (grad, value_and_grad, vjp, jvp, vmap) + 8 domain modules (Random, Linalg, FFT, Fast, Quantize, IO, Transforms, NN). Mlx.NN provides 13 activations, 5 loss functions, 3 functional layers, 4 re-exports from Mlx.Fast.
438 tests with 0 failures. 44 Python MLX comparison tests validate numerical accuracy across unary ops, binary ops, reductions, activations, matmul, linalg, cumulative ops. All within 1e-5 tolerance.

Error handler captures mlx-c errors. Backend raises Elixir exceptions via unwrap!/1. 11 error quality tests assert message content via regex: shape mismatches, dtype errors, axis errors, I/O errors, type constraints, pointer ops, transform errors, slice errors.
438 tests, 0 failures. Includes 33 NN tests, 44 Python comparison tests, 11 error quality tests, 16 transform tests, 27 compiler grad tests, 8 integration tests.

required_truths.evidence: README.md differentiates from EMLX via mlx-c ABI stability.
Build validated with mlx-c v0.5.0 on Apple Silicon. 438 tests, 0 failures.
5 resource types (array, stream, device, vector_array, closure_bridge) with destructors.
mlx_set_error_handler at NIF load. Thread-local buffer. unwrap!/1 raises Elixir exceptions. 11 error quality tests validate message content.
72 Nx.Backend callbacks (66 native + 6 BinaryBackend fallback). Mlx.NN adds functional nn layer ops. Mlx.Transforms adds grad/vjp/jvp/vmap.
Compiler implements lazy eval. Nx.Defn.grad works through Mlx.Compiler (27 tests). Mlx.Transforms provides MLX-native transforms (16 tests).
Bidirectional dtype mapping (Nx <-> MLX). f64 excluded (Metal limitation) with clear ArgumentError.
eval, to_binary, synchronize + all transform NIFs use ERL_NIF_DIRTY_JOB_CPU_BOUND.
